concept.title: Changed Behaviours
concept.shortdesc: This plugin does not always behaves the same way than others DITA OT plugins.

conbody.p: This plugin is an attempt to bring more Web design capabilities into the DITA OT. It has been design to allows the creations of Themes (you might name this Skins).
There are some expected beahviors that are not implemented in this plugin.
Below are the list of arguments, that are used differently in this plugin.

section.title: args.cssroot
section.p: The args.cssroot is used to choose a theme instead of a css
